title: Episode 8: The Mandate — Season 1 Finale (Berserk Cut)

pages.caption: The Sprawl — Infinite corporate dimension. The loneliest figure in corporate hell.
Just do the job. Deliver the mail. Even if home doesn't exist.
Ace's Offer — No longer fully human. Chrome tendrils. 'JOIN US.'
'I ALREADY HAVE A CONTRACT.' The Union Contract glows gold.
The Key That Opens All Locks — breaks the dimension itself.
The Shareholders Rise — Global Finance. Conglomerate X. Synergy Corp.
THE CAVALRY ARRIVES — 'We're postal workers. We deliver.'
D.O.L. vs. Shareholders — Postal weapons vs cosmic corporate horror.
THE MANDATE — Universal Service Obligation. Every address. No exceptions.
The Sprawl Collapses — Reality beckons. Ace abandoned by his masters.
Homecoming — Dawn. Coffee. Peace. The building stands. They survived.
